entry.title: Saturday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Light snow in the Natuashish area before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming north 20 gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain or snow. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow changing to rain in the evening. Risk of freezing rain in the evening. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Rainfall amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northeast 40 gusting to 60 in the evening. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Saturday 04 March 2023
